====================
libgunshotmatch-mpl
====================

.. start short_desc

**Matplotlib intergration for GunShotMatch.**

.. end short_desc

Installation
--------------

.. start installation

``libgunshotmatch-mpl`` can be installed from PyPI.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install libgunshotmatch-mpl

.. end installation
